ibbt.sumo.util
Class SSHWrapper

java.lang.Object
  ibbt.sumo.util.SSHWrapper

public class SSHWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper class for all kinds of shell commands that need to be executed on a remote host over ssh
